scripts.build: bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/shortmoji-$npm_package_version-chrome.zip manifest.json content.js emoji-data.js styles.css popup.html popup.js icon.svg icons/ -x '*.DS_Store'
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/shortmoji-$npm_package_version-firefox.zip manifest.json content.js emoji-data.js styles.css popup.html popup.js icon.svg icons/ -x '*.DS_Store'
